EnhancedContent: I have a small basic laptop that has like 18 gig free on the hard drive I use as a backup to my desktop that died.It’s a great cheap Asus that serves its purpose well. My question is that when I get my new desktop in a few days, should I create a separate Microsoft account for the new desktop, or use that same for both PCs? My concern is if I store a lot on the desktop, will it sync to the smaller laptop and transfer all the data to it? Basically, I am not clear how this would work.
